headline: Technical Lead / Software Engineer at DataArt

experience.description:
The goal was to maintain and refactor the reporting functionality of a Clinical Trials System (Healthcare).
This involved reverse engineering to understand current behavior for test administration and reporting, followed by reorganizing and cleaning the code using the Actors Pattern on Service Fabric.

The system was implemented on Azure using services and actors architecture, consuming both relational and NoSQL databases.

The management system behind a Gaming and Meetings Platform was designed and developed from the ground up by our team. Its primary goal was to centralize quiz creation, meeting scheduling, and the collection of user behavioral data for analytics. The system was implemented using a cloud-based microservice architecture, integrating both relational and NoSQL databases for storage.

Led a remote team of +10 people (FE & BE Devs / QAs from Argentina, Poland and Ukraine).

Organize and lead Daily and Retro Meetings, organized Planning Sessions.
Prioritization of stories and technical tasks, discussions with Business Analysts and Architects.
Communication with management and other team leads about team status, blockers, risks, next releases.
Act as a Facilitator to unblock tickets (organize meetings, brainstorm solutions, evaluate alternatives).
Helped recruiting candidates for the project or the company.

Help with BE development and production support tasks.

.NET Core 2.1 + EF Core.
Back-End Web API project implemented with micro-services on Docker, runnning in Amazon Web Services (AWS).

Identity Server Set Up and integration with API micro-services.
Integration of micro-services with Refit.

Code Reviews for Pull Requests integrated as part of the merge process.

Helped on Business and Technical Stories preparation and technical details (Construction Planning).

Technical tools used: Postman for testing the API, Git for code versioning.

Other tools used: BitBucket for code storage/code review, TeamCity for continuous integration, Confluence for stories documentation, Jira as a ticketing system, Slack for daily-basis communication, Zoom for frequent meetings.

Responsible for the technical and many management aspects of the development of a multi-layer solution for a big American company, with a 6-people Dev+QA team.

Scrum. Meetings with clients: estimations, plannings, retrospectives. Architectural decisions. Documentation. Deployments. Sprint management through Jira.

TFS 2015 with TeamCity integration, SQL Server 2012, VS2013, .NET 4.5, MVC 5, jQuery. EF 6.

Creation of Reverse Proxy. APIs integration with REST & SOAP services. Creation of Localization Framework and caching. Use of different external libraries/frameworks: AutoMapper, FluentMigrator, DataTables .NET, knockout.js.

Software development for American companies.

Scrum. Meetings with clients: estimations, plannings, retrospectives. Documentation. Deployments. Sprint management through Jira.

TFS 2015 with  TeamCity integration, SQL Server 2012, VS2013, .NET 4.5, MVC 5, jQuery. EF 6..

Creation of Reverse Proxy. APIs integration with REST & SOAP services. Creation of Localization Framework and caching. Use of different external libraries/frameworks: AutoMapper, FluentMigrator, DataTables .NET, knockout.js.

Software development for Entertainment companies: FOX Network Group / Sony DADC.

Scrum. Meetings with clients: estimations, plannings, retrospectives.

TFS 2010 & 2012, SQL Server 2008, VS2010, .NET 3.5, WCF, .NET 4, Silverlight 5, EF 4.1. jQuery. UI automation with Telerik Studio.

RestSharp for consuming APIs. EF 6. Azure storages: SQL Server, Blob storage.

C# .NET 4.0 Developer (Visual Studio 2010 + ReSharper). Entity Framework. SQL Server 2008. Reporting Services. MVC2. MVC3 with Razor. HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Ajax, jQuery (with jqGrid). Unit Testing with nUnit, MSTest. FluentMigrator. Some experience with Sprint .NET, nHibernate 3.2, AutoMapper, nInject, nAnt.

Analysis with US clients. Designed & developed a REST API for a project and a SDK for consuming it.

Agile methodologies mainly Scrum. Sprint planning: estimations (poker planning). Daily meetings. Retrospective meetings.

Developments in VB6 / VB .NET (2.0, 3.5) + SQL Server 2005/2008. Crystal Reports. ASP / ASP .NET. Technical support. Deployment with stakeholders. C# .NET developments. Analysis and Design tasks. Testing: black box, Unit Testing (nUnit, MSTest). Documentation. Development, maintenance and support of a complex commercial application used by important customers. Use of solutions of distributed caché (Memcached). LinQ. MongoDB. Presentation Layer: Ajax, JavaScript, jQuery, HTML, CSS. DBA: backups, DTS developments, Jobs. Versioning: SVN, GIT.

headline: Senior Executive & Personal Assistant
about:
More than 15 years providing top level assistance.
I have successfully orchestrated complex calendars, daily office duties and  business and personal travel agendas. Lifestyle Management.
Always very proactive with excellent problem solving skills.
Seamless project management from end to end.
Some of the tools that help me thrive: Microsoft Office, G-Suite, Internet, Asana, Teams, Zoom, Outlook Calendar, Trello, Hubspot, Ad Manager, Canva, among others.

In my free time, I have summoned a group of parents from my children's school to work towards a climate adaptive and more natural playground 🌿🌸🚸. Still working on it! 💪 
Passionate about  helping my peers, humans&nature, education and childhood development.

experience.location: Valencia/València, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España
experience.description:
Fixed term contract as executive/personal assistant to the President in a fast paced and demanding role.
Full Calendar management.
Orchestration and execution of complex and ever changing travel agenda.
Managing personal and corporate errands as needed.
Control and manage personal documentation for key stakeholder and his family.
Occassional support to the Events Department.

During the last years I have  exploring and focused on Digital Marketing, developing tasks as a Digital Trafficker (AdOps) such as:

+ Managing  client´s advertising campaigns (PPC) on different portals including banner ads and newsletters (Google AD Manager)
+ Generating reports for advertisers and in house (Google Analytics, Excel)
+ Setup, monitor and optimize campaigns full cycle (from validating availability, to set up and constant watch to ensure delivery accordingly)
+ Collaborate across multiple departments
+ Currently my duties are related specifically to digital trafficker position for a forex website

More than 15 years providing assistance to c-level executives in multinational companies such as Baker & McKenzie, Wachovia Bank and Laboratorios Roemmers.

* Complex calendar management
* Planning and organizing trips (domestic and intl)
* Payments, bank accounts, expenses report
* Insurance policies
* Household management
* Expert on handling sensitive and confidential information with discretion
* Typing contracts and follow up of legal procedures
* This experience includes 8 years working as a PA for an HNWI at Laboratorios Roemmers.

Plus,
→ Enthusiastic self-starter with excellent ability to multitask, prioritize and work under pressure.
→ Native Spanish
→ Bilingual English/Spanish

headline: Senior Manager | Customer Success, Implementation & Training | Driving ESG Tech Adoption & Client Enablement
about:
Dynamic and results-driven Senior Manager with 15+ years of international experience across Customer Success, Implementation, Training, and Support. Currently leading the Implementation & Training team at Datamaran, where I empower global clients to unlock the full value of our ESG risk management platform through seamless onboarding, strategic insights, and robust enablement programs.

I bring a strong track record of designing and executing high-impact training initiatives, streamlining implementation processes, and driving platform adoption through a consultative, client-centric approach. Passionate about technology and process improvement, I lead cross-functional teams to deliver scalable, tailored solutions that meet diverse client needs.

A trusted partner in product development, I work closely with Agile teams to scope, test, and enhance platform features, ensuring alignment with client goals and market trends. My collaborative style, attention to detail, and deep commitment to service excellence have consistently contributed to improved operational efficiency and customer satisfaction.

Native Spanish speaker and proficient in English, I thrive in multicultural environments and excel at building strong, long-lasting relationships with clients and colleagues worldwide.
topSkills: Project Management • Customer Management • Training • Software Implementation • Customer Onboarding

experience.description:
- I help clients overcome product-related issues and educate them about how the product works, recent updates and other technical troubleshooting, aiming to make them as autonomous as possible in using the platform.                    
- I provide continuous support to our customers throughout their whole customer journey in a variety of ways: video calls, help center documentation, video recording, email, chat and other educational resources.
- Product testing for upcoming releases and usage documentation preparation.
- Client and user admin.

experience.position: Customer Service Executive and Operations Assistant
experience.location: Calpe/Calp, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España
experience.description:
·	Provided excellent customer service, establishing a relationship of trust with clients.
·	Managed construction projects and operations.
·	Processed client requests via calls, chats, and emails.
·	Contributed to an increase in budget acceptance with the implementation of a CRM platform to closely follow up prospects and leads.

I learned HTML, CSS and Bootstrap to create a website for a personal business.
I also created the brand, logo, and developed the online presence of the brand, specifically at IG, FB and Google MyBusiness.

experience.location: Benissa, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España
experience.description:
·	Managed the entire wholesale distribution process, building long lasting relationships with our customers.
·	Managed three retail stores, supervising staff and daily operations.
·	Implemented a sales point management system to digitalize operations, and trained all users on the best practices and usage of the platform.

·	Updated the web site and databases daily with information of over 15 countries.
·	Edited HTML code.
·	Performed different data processing tasks.

·	Managed daily operations for the store.
·	Exceeded annual sales objectives three times.
·	In charge of the store administration, including processing invoices, cash flow, stock management, orders and payments.
·	Contributed to the design and implementation of a sales point management system, collaborating with the programming team.

experience.location: Ciudad autónoma de Buenos Aires, Argentina
experience.description:
·	Presented, promoted and sold the service to prospective customers.
·	Lead product training sessions of up to 10 users at a time, maximizing usage and improving customer retention.
·	Contributed with the engineering team for the design and test of our own CRM platform.

receivedRecommendations.description:
I had the pleasure of working closely with Maria in her leadership capacity for Implementation & Training. 

Without fail, Maria demonstrates the ability to step up to new challenges with confidence and adaptability. Whether navigating complex client environments or learning the intricacies of ESG frameworks, she quickly mastered the subject matter and became a trusted expert both internally and externally.

She is a wonderful thought partner. In structuring her team and function, she focuses on people first, not compromising on where we could be more efficient in serving customers’ needs.

headline: Abogado AML en banca | Impulsando la adopción cripto
about:
Abogado especializado en Compliance y Prevención de Blanqueo (AML/CFT), con experiencia internacional en el sector bancario.

Mi enfoque combina el cumplimiento regulatorio tradicional con una visión moderna del sistema financiero, integrando el impacto de la tecnología y los criptoactivos.

Actualmente mi objetivo es impulsar la adopción cripto en Argentina.

Algunos puntos sobre mi trayectoria:

• Graduado en Derecho por la Universidad Torcuato Di Tella (2020).
• Experiencia en análisis de operaciones, gestión de riesgos y políticas AML/KYC dentro de entornos bancarios.
• Participación activa en el ecosistema cripto desde 2018, con formación continua en sus aspectos técnicos, económicos y regulatorios.
• Tres años viviendo en España, donde desarrollé una visión global e integral del sistema financiero.
• Interés en negocios, inversión, regulación y economía digital.

location.linkedinText: Buenos Aires, Buenos Aires Province, Argentina

experience.description:
•	gestión y análisis de alertas de comportamiento, evaluando la coherencia entre la actividad del cliente, su perfil operativo y el riesgo asociado, para detectar posibles indicios de blanqueo de capitales o financiación del terrorismo (BC/FT).

	•	Elaboré informes de revisión exhaustivos, integrando información interna y fuentes externas para ofrecer una visión completa del cliente y respaldar las decisiones del área de cumplimiento.

	•	Apliqué políticas y procedimientos AML/KYC y EDD bajo estándares internacionales, asegurando la solidez documental y la trazabilidad de los procesos.

	•	Contribuí a mantener la calidad analítica y consistencia regulatoria del departamento, trabajando en un entorno de alta exigencia y confidencialidad.

	•	Consolidé una visión integral del sistema financiero, uniendo la experiencia en banca tradicional con el conocimiento del ecosistema cripto y su evolución regulatoria.

-Management and handling of legal case files
Client interaction to establish strategies
Legal procuration

certifications.title: Legal Tech and the Digital Transformation of Law

receivedRecommendations.description: He trabajado con Eros y me parece un profesional muy fácil de trabajar con el, captar la idea enseguida, las necesidades y proactivo recomendando la estrategias y plan de acción.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Digital Marketing Strategist | Storytelling & Branding | Digital Growth Consultant📈
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: November 3, 2023, Diveana managed Eros directly
receivedRecommendations.description: Eros es un profesional responsable, proactivo, orientado a soluciones; una persona muy motivada a solventar cualquier dificultad que se presente. En todas sus tareas se desempeña buscando la excelencia, de forma clara y precisa. Todo un privilegio tenerlo en cualquier equipo.

headline: Ingeniero Industrial
about: Ingeniero Industrial altamente motivado con pasión por la innovación y un fuerte deseo de mejorar el desempeño en el lugar de trabajo. Capaz de explotar conocimientos basados ​​en datos para mejorar e impulsar los resultados. Experiencia en relacionarse con los clientes para comprender sus necesidades y aportando soluciones que satisfagan dichos objetivos. Experto en automatización y optimización de procesos, con énfasis en disminuir el tiempo de inactividad y potenciar la eficiencia. Un miembro de equipo flexible y de aprendizaje rápido que está ansioso por probar cosas nuevas y recoger nuevas habilidades.
topSkills: SQL • Microsoft Power BI • Microsoft Excel • Python

experience.description:
Tareas principales:

- Recopilar, limpiar y transformar datos mediante proceso ETL de diversas fuentes como bases de datos, herramientas CRM (Hubspot) para obtener métricas para el negocio.
- Desarrollar paneles interactivos e informes utilizando Power BI y Looker Studio.
- Supervisar los KPI y evaluar el rendimiento empresarial. Realizar pronósticos de la demanda para predecir tendencias futuras.

Internship en Trade Lifecycle, Affirmations Team CIB.

La pasantía consistió en estar a cargo de una cartera de clientes asignada, de darle seguimiento a las operaciones de derivados exóticos otc y contratos legales. Afirmación económica de los trades y disputa de contratos y clausulas legales con las contrapartes. Constante contacto con FO teams internos, externos, equipos legales y MO's para risk management de las operaciones.

experience.location: Buenos Aires, Ciudad Autónoma de Buenos Aires, Argentina
experience.description:
Reporte mensual del Plan Ocupacional y Estructura Organizativa.
Análisis de Datos. Capacitación a los Business Partners. 
Responsable a cargo de la creación de Posiciones y Unidades organizativas demandas por todos los sectores de la empresa.
Toma de decisiones en la estructura organizativa. 
Automatización de procesos requeridos por el negocio.

experience.location: Buenos Aires, Provincia de Buenos Aires, Argentina
experience.description:
Control y reportes del personal tercerizado (Outsourcing).
Armado de legajos.
Auditorías internas dentro de Coca Cola en relación al cumplimiento de normas y políticas corporativas aplicables a RR. HH.
Asistencia a niveles gerenciales en presentaciones y respuestas a requerimientos legales y de organismos de control

experience.location: Buenos Aires, Provincia de Buenos Aires, Argentina
experience.description: Tareas administrativas y Relevamiento de procesos.

headline: Europe Maintenance Lead - Maintenance & Reliability Strategy
about:
Industrial Engineer with 15+ years of international experience in maintenance management, asset reliability, sustainability, and process optimization within the food & beverage industry. Expert in global program implementation, digital transformation (SAP PM, mobility, data analytics), TPM, IWS and Lean Six Sigma to enhance efficiency, reduce costs, and optimize resources.
Proven leadership in managing multicultural, cross-functional teams and aligning corporate strategy with measurable outcomes at global, regional, and local levels. Passionate about technological innovation, continuous improvement, and projects that drive both business growth and professional development.


#MaintenanceManagement #AssetReliability #Sustainability #DigitalTransformation #FoodAndBeverageIndustry #LeanSixSigma #TPM #IWS #SAPPM #Leadership #IndustrialEngineering
topSkills: TPM • IWS • Autonomous maintenance • Planned Maintenance

experience.position: Europe Maintenance Lead - Maintenance  & Reliability Strategy
E2E Assets Reliability, & Resource Conservation Manager - South West Europe
Maintenance Engineering Manager - Digital transformation - SAP PM
experience.description: Designed and developed global standard maintenance processes in SAP, later adopted as the benchmark for SAP implementations in other regions. Actively contributed to a network of key users to foster standardization, share best practices, and identify opportunities for continuous improvement across sites. Led Super Users through the SAP HANA PM module rollout across the UK and Poland, ensuring smooth deployment, high adoption, and alignment with business objectives. Provided system guidance and delivered training to BU core teams, driving both successful implementation and sustainable operations. Partnered with IT to launch digital solutions, including Mobility, to improve execution efficiency and reduce costs.

experience.position: PepsiCo ESSA (Europe & Sub-Saharan Africa) - Maint. Category Expert Trainer. 21 beverages sites.
experience.description:
Developed the Beverage Labour Tool, a solution that standardizes maintenance organization structures across all sites. Served as part of the PepsiCo Global Template (PGT) team, leading the creation of standard processes for SAP PM HANA implementation across all PepsiCo sites, and collaborating on successful rollouts in the UK and Poland.
Led the identification and implementation of Good Operation Practices (GOP) across sites, and conducted site assessments to measure PeMM (PepsiCo Maintenance Methodology) maturity. Coordinated the follow-up of MIAP (Maintenance Improvement Action Plans) to drive maintenance performance improvements.
Worked closely with global and regional teams to update and deploy PeMM assessments at a global scale. Conducted benchmarking analysis and facilitated maintenance deep dive workshops to boost efficiency, lower maintenance costs, reduce spare parts inventory, and optimize processes.
Provided maintenance leadership for 14 capital projects (new lines/equipment), ensuring a vertical start-up and operational readiness from day one.

experience.position: Reg. Productivity team. Maint. Planner & Inventory Leader LATAM. 26 sites located in 10 countries.
experience.description:
Standardized maintenance planning processes across multiple sites, applying a continuous improvement approach to optimize plans, reduce Planned Maintenance Down Time, and maximize technical utilization—ensuring compliance with safety, quality, and performance standards.

Led spare parts optimization initiatives, deploying an inventory Scorecard to monitor and control stock levels. Collaborated with global and regional experts to align policies and procedures, and co-developed with the Lean Six Sigma team a tool to set min/max inventory levels based on consumption history.

Conducted field assessments of inventory and planned maintenance to identify improvement opportunities, tracking savings through Power Steering to achieve annual working capital targets.

Served as PeMM (PepsiCo Maintenance Methodology) assessor for LATAM, measuring implementation maturity across sites and driving Maintenance Improvement Action Plans (MIAP) follow-up.

Coordinated Deep Dive workshops focused on productivity improvements (true efficiency, waste reduction, labor optimization, maintenance), working alongside global teams when needed.

As an additional achievement, created the Global Maintenance Dashboard in collaboration with IT, integrating SAP data for streamlined reporting on Maintenance Compliance, Inventory, Downtime Tracking, and Maintenance Spend.

Maintenance Planner at Gatorade line during for 1.5 years, after that same role at line 3, Planta Sur. 
Line 3: Packaging of 2 lts, 2,25 lts, 2lts returnable PET formats, which is the most important line in the Factory due to the hectoliters packed.
Responsible for the development of the maintenance operators in TBE model (team-based work) 
Responsible for the maintenance KPI (safety, budget, TE, maintenance compliance, technical utilization, etc) working with preventive, corrective and predictive maintenance.
Coached line operators in TPM.

experience.position: Analyst / planning engineer at Mini Planta 1 (8 packaging production line).
experience.description:
* In charge of critical equipment analysis. 
Technical and economical viability analysis in order to improve production line efficiency. 
Critical spare parts analysis to nationalize them, and stock management.

experience.position: VPO (Voyager Plant Optimization) and TPM analyst at Planta SUR
experience.description: * VPO is an ABInbev global program which aims at successful management. Technical support provider to the different sectors of the company, working together with the PIN. The PIN is responsible for coordinating the VPO implementation in the manufacturing plant. In addition, I provided the operators with VPO and TPM training.

2009 – 2010. Technical services, 
* Optimizing the distribution of technician within the country according to client demand.

2008 / 2009. Trainee at Tyco, ADT Security Services. Management control analyst. 
* In charge of Argentina and Uruguay economics index administration. New products sales costs analysis. Warehouse outsourcing study

education.schoolName: Pontificia Universidad Católica Argentina 'Santa María de los Buenos Aires'​
education.degree: Master’s degree in Agro-food industry management
Bachelor of science in Industrial Engineering
education.fieldOfStudy: Universidad Nacional de Buenos Aires (UBA University)

courses.title: Solar and low power wind energy

Led the identification and implementation of Good Operation Practices (GOP) across sites, and conducted site assessments to measure PeMM (PepsiCo Maintenance Methodology) maturity. Coordinated the follow-up of MIAP (Maintenance Improvement Action Plans) to drive maintenance performance improvements.
Worked closely with global and regional teams to update and deploy PeMM assessments at a global scale. Conducted benchmarking analysis and facilitated maintenance deep dive workshops to boost efficiency, lower maintenance costs, reduce spare parts inventory, and optimize processes.
Provided maintenance leadership for 14 capital projects (new lines/equipment), ensuring a vertical start-up and operational readiness from day one.

experience.position: Reg. Productivity team. Maint. Planner & Inventory Leader LATAM. 26 sites located in 10 countries.
experience.description:
Standardized maintenance planning processes across multiple sites, applying a continuous improvement approach to optimize plans, reduce Planned Maintenance Down Time, and maximize technical utilization—ensuring compliance with safety, quality, and performance standards.

Led spare parts optimization initiatives, deploying an inventory Scorecard to monitor and control stock levels. Collaborated with global and regional experts to align policies and procedures, and co-developed with the Lean Six Sigma team a tool to set min/max inventory levels based on consumption history.

Conducted field assessments of inventory and planned maintenance to identify improvement opportunities, tracking savings through Power Steering to achieve annual working capital targets.

Served as PeMM (PepsiCo Maintenance Methodology) assessor for LATAM, measuring implementation maturity across sites and driving Maintenance Improvement Action Plans (MIAP) follow-up.

Coordinated Deep Dive workshops focused on productivity improvements (true efficiency, waste reduction, labor optimization, maintenance), working alongside global teams when needed.

As an additional achievement, created the Global Maintenance Dashboard in collaboration with IT, integrating SAP data for streamlined reporting on Maintenance Compliance, Inventory, Downtime Tracking, and Maintenance Spend.

Maintenance Planner at Gatorade line during for 1.5 years, after that same role at line 3, Planta Sur. 
Line 3: Packaging of 2 lts, 2,25 lts, 2lts returnable PET formats, which is the most important line in the Factory due to the hectoliters packed.
Responsible for the development of the maintenance operators in TBE model (team-based work) 
Responsible for the maintenance KPI (safety, budget, TE, maintenance compliance, technical utilization, etc) working with preventive, corrective and predictive maintenance.
Coached line operators in TPM.

experience.position: Analyst / planning engineer at Mini Planta 1 (8 packaging production line).
experience.description:
* In charge of critical equipment analysis. 
Technical and economical viability analysis in order to improve production line efficiency. 
Critical spare parts analysis to nationalize them, and stock management.

experience.position: VPO (Voyager Plant Optimization) and TPM analyst at Planta SUR
experience.description: * VPO is an ABInbev global program which aims at successful management. Technical support provider to the different sectors of the company, working together with the PIN. The PIN is responsible for coordinating the VPO implementation in the manufacturing plant. In addition, I provided the operators with VPO and TPM training.

2009 – 2010. Technical services, 
* Optimizing the distribution of technician within the country according to client demand.

2008 / 2009. Trainee at Tyco, ADT Security Services. Management control analyst. 
* In charge of Argentina and Uruguay economics index administration. New products sales costs analysis. Warehouse outsourcing study

headline: Psicóloga General Sanitaria
about:
Hola! soy Paula tengo 22 años de trayectoria en el ámbito de la Educación y la Salud Mental, actualmente ejerzo como Psicóloga General Sanitaria en mi consultorio privado. Mi experiencia previa como Docente y Directora en Nivel Inicial me ha permitido desarrollar un enfoque integral en la atención a la infancia y la educación emocional.
Mi práctica profesional se basa en un enfoque integrativo, adaptando cada proceso terapéutico a las necesidades específicas de mis pacientes. Estoy comprometida con la Integración Escolar, ayudando a niños, familias y docentes a transitar este camino de manera efectiva.
Mi propósito es seguir contribuyendo al bienestar emocional y al desarrollo de estrategias que potencien el aprendizaje y la salud mental en la infancia.

headline: Software Engineer en ING
about:
Soy una persona proactiva, analítica, me gusta compartir conocimientos y trabajar en equipo. Tengo un alto grado de auto exigencia en lo que hago y soy muy responsable.
Cuento con ciudadanía Italiana, lo cual me permite trabajar en España.

profileTopEducation.schoolName: Universidad Nacional del Centro de la Provincia de Buenos Aires

experience.description:
Desarrollo de varios proyectos de web services (REST, SOAP, microservicios hechos en Spring Boot). Todo implementado con Java 8, Hibernate, JPA. Distintas bases de datos según el proyecto, entre ellas Oracle y PostgreSQL. Otros proyectos indexan datos en Elastic Search y relizan consultas sobre los índices creados.
Los proyectos están desplegados en servidores Wildfly o Apache Tomcat. Se usa para el testing Postman y Soap-UI, segun el proyecto.
Java 8 - REST - SOAP - Spring Boot - Hibernate - JPA - Oracle - PostgreSQL - ElasticSearch - Wildfly - Apache Tomcat - Postman - SOAP-UI - JUnit - Metodologías ágiles

Sistema de gestión de causas judiciales para el poder judicial.
Java 6 - Oracle ADF Framework - Oracle database - Metodologías ágiles

Análisis y especificación de requerimientos, diseño, desarrollo, testing y puesta en marcha. Sistema a medida para administrar, en la provincia de Buenos Aires, el acceso al servicio de la Defensa Pública en lo Civil. Creación y gestión de encuestas, aplicando reglas de evaluación complejas totalmente configurables. Disponibilidad de diferentes procesos para la evaluación del acceso al servicio. Generación de informes detallados y resultados obtenidos. Creación y gestión de usuarios con diferentes roles.
Java 7 - Motor de reglas Drools - Spring (MVC y Security) - Hibernate - JSTL - MySQL database - Apache Tomcat

Análisis y especificación de requerimientos. 
Consultoría para desarrollar un sistema a medida que amplíe la funcionalidad de un ERP.

Puesta en marcha, configuración y uso del ERP Tango Gestión. Creación de reportes personalizados acorde a los requisitos de cada usuario, a través de SQL Server 2008. 
Asesoramiento a usuarios finales, atendiendo los requerimientos de las diferentes áreas de la compañía. 
Mantenimiento de la red en general. Realización de backups. Detección, seguimiento y resolución de incidencias. Mantenimiento, reparación y actualización de equipos.
Tango Gestión ERP - SQL Server 2008 database

Mantenimiento de páginas Web, detección, reporte y seguimiento de errores.
HTML5 - XML - CSS - JavaScript - JQuery

education.schoolName: Universidad Nacional del Centro de la Provincia de Buenos Aires
education.description:
Registro Público de Graduados Universitarios: https://registrograduados.siu.edu.ar

Obtuve con el título intermedio Analista Programador Universitario en el 2009. En el año 2010 rendí el último final de la carrera Ingeniería de Sistemas. En el 2011 debido al trabajo postergué el comienzo de la tesis hasta mediados de 2013. A comienzos de 2015 me gradué con el título de Ingeniero en Sistemas.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Functional Business Analyst & Advanced Certified Scrum Master
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: November 1, 2019, Mercedes and Gisel studied together
receivedRecommendations.description:
Gisel turned into a high quality professional who always excels. She's very analytical, going really in depth and finding out not only the expected but also the alternative and corner cases present in every project. She is key to optimize functional coverage and therefore development process.
She is also the ideal blend of soft and technical skills. She never gives up!
Gisel really commits with her dutties, being a key team player you'll always want to count on.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Software Engineer and Sr React Frontend Developer at BCNC Group
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: September 26, 2019, Marcos worked with Gisel on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description:
Gisel was key and instrumental in the projects we work together, providing ideas and support on the ongoing efforts. She is not only a highly skilled and reliable professional but also an excellent teammate who never hesitate to share her knowledge and coaching others.
She is able to coordinate the team tasks and align efforts to meet project deadlines. She is savvy at the time of facing complex assignments, always caring about improving her methods and skills and having a very analytical approach to the requirements and problems. 
I would definitely work with Gisel again, due to his soft skills and strong technical competencies.

headline: Customer Service | Law | Mediation | Legal Design | Tech |  Project Management | Big Data | Legal Design
about:
📌Abogada con orientación en Mediación y Gestión del Conflicto. 

🧩Positiva y empática con experiencia laboral en diferentes países.

👉 En constante aprendizaje de nuevas herramientas y conocimientos para aplicar en el día a día. 

📊 En el camino de consultoría de RRHH.

experience.description:
- Manage the onboarding of new clients and provide ongoing support to ensure successful platform usage through personalized training and access to help center resources.
- Build strong client relationships, focusing on their continuous growth and proactively addressing their platform challenges.
- Monitor client satisfaction and contribute to product development by channeling client needs and technical challenges to the product and development team.
- Resolve queries and incidents via platform chat and email.
- Write and update articles for the platform's help center

I was part of a multidisciplinary and multicultural team composed of legal professionals, designers, and IT specialists. Our mission was to democratize legal content, making it understandable for everyone through accessible language and a user-friendly format.

experience.position: Representante del servicio de atención al cliente
experience.location: Alfafar, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España
experience.description:
- Atención al cliente vía telefónica y correo electrónico.
- Gestión de incidencias
- Servicio Posventa
- Apoyo Interdepartamental

Tiempo de aprendizaje de nuevas habilidades técnicas en el campo del Legal Design-Tech, y Análisis de Dato - Big Data, así como sus herramientas necesarias para poder llevarlo a cabo. 

La perspectiva de incorporar nuevas habilidades tecnológicas enriquece y diversifica mi perfil jurídico y resolutivo. Es una gran oportunidad para combinar estas dos áreas y aprovechar las sinergias entre ellas.

experience.location: Valencia/València, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España
experience.description:
En los últimos años he vivido en diferentes ciudades, entre ellas, Copenhague donde he fortalecido mi inglés y he descubierto la cultura danesa. 

Tiempo después me he mudado a la capital andaluza española viviendo las costumbres de Sevilla. 

Y, finalmente, me he instalado en Valencia para realizar mis estudios de posgrado en las diferentes alternativas de conflicto dictado por la Universidad pública de la ciudad. 

A su vez, en cada sitio nombrado, he trabajado en atención al cliente en el sector de la hostelería y el comercio minorista.

experience.position: Atención al cliente y administración de pisos turísticos
experience.description:
- Asistir a los clientes a través del teléfono, chat en vivo y correo electrónico; brindando atención al cliente de calidad en turnos flexibles.
- Gestión de la operativa diaria de coordinación de los check in/out y todo lo relacionado a las estancias de los huéspedes en los pisos turísticos.  
- Gestionar y dar seguimiento a todas las consultas y reclamos, tanto de los clientes como los huéspedes.
- Proveer un servicio de calidad de forma positiva, proactiva y empática a los clientes y huéspedes; reconociendo las incidencias y gestionando las oportunidades.
- Gestionar información sensible y tratar cuidadosamente los datos de los clientes y huéspedes.

experience.companyName: IMECO Instituto de Mediación y Conciliación
experience.description:
- Prácticas externas que se han centrado en complementar y poner en ejercicio los conocimientos adquiridos en el Máster de Mediación, Arbitraje y Gestión de Conflictos en Derecho Privado, concretamente en el ámbito de la mediación.
- Desarrollo de un Proyecto de Mediación Escolar a realizar en centros educativos del territorio español.
- Adquisición de habilidades, conocimientos y destrezas para el ejercicio profesional.

- Soporte al cliente en la gestión de pedidos de flores en la tienda web.
- Asistir simultáneamente a los clientes a través del teléfono, chat en vivo y correo electrónico, brindando un servicio al consumidor de forma personalizada en inglés.
- Seguimiento de consultas en el CRM.

experience.location: Ciudad Autónoma de Buenos Aires, Argentina
experience.companyName: Proyecto “Bosques Nativos y Comunidad” del Ministerio de Ambiente de la Nación
experience.description:
- Asesoramiento, asistencia legal y gestión de informes al Director, Coordinadores y actores de las diferentes áreas del Proyecto, como también del Ministerio, BIRF, PNUD y otras instituciones públicas. 
- Redacción, gestión de firmas y comunicación de convenios con otros organismos públicos y privados.
- Investigación y análisis de soluciones a los inconvenientes a surtidos.
- Tareas administrativas propias de la gestión del puesto laboral.

experience.location: Ciudad Autónoma de Buenos Aires, Argentina
experience.companyName: Programa SUMAR - Ministerio de Salud de la Nación
experience.description:
- Asesoramiento, asistencia legal y gestión de informes al Coordinador General y de las distintas áreas, como también a los diferentes actores del Programa, Ministerio, BIRF y de otros organismos públicos.
- Redacción, comunicación y seguimiento de cumplimiento de normativas internas del Programa. 
- Encargada de la gestión diaria de las tareas relativas a la calidad del Programa de acuerdo a la norma ISO 9001.
- Redacción, gestión de firmas y seguimiento de cumplimiento  de convenios con las unidades provinciales del Programa y otros organismos públicos.
- Análisis y gestión de informes relativo a las auditorías externas del Programa.

experience.companyName: Estudio de Abogados Sayús y Perez Alisedo
experience.description:
- Recepcionista de despacho de abogados. Gestión de atención de centralita telefónica, e-mails y clientes.
- Gestión de agenda de reuniones y lo requerido por los abogados. 
- Asistencia legal y administrativa a los abogados de la firma.
- Redacción de demandas, escritos y notificaciones judiciales.
- Procuración de escritos, notificaciones judiciales y trámites administrativos.

experience.location: Ciudad Autónoma de Buenos Aires, Argentina
experience.description:
- Gestionar información sensible y tratar cuidadosamente los datos de los 
clientes.
- Asistir simultáneamente a los clientes a través del teléfono y correo electrónico; brindando atención al cliente de calidad en turnos flexibles.
- Manejar y dar seguimiento a todas las consultas y reclamos de los clientes en el CRM.
- Proveer un servicio de forma positiva, proactiva y empática a los clientes; reconociendo las quejas y abordando las preocupaciones.
- Proporcionar al potencial cliente información detallada sobre los productos de seguros.

- Supervisión y control de procesos durante la operación diaria. 
- Atención a los proveedores y al cliente. 
- Realización de pedidos, recepción y control de mercadería. 
- Entrenamiento del personal. 
- Manejo de dinero, cierre de cajas, arqueo de caja fuerte. Elaboración y control de inventarios.

education.description: Introducción al Business intelligence Advanced Analytics, Web Analytics, Data Management, Data Fundamentals con Python, Data Science, Machine Learning, Arquitecturas Cloud & Big Data, Ecosistema Data y análisis de datos

education.degree: Máster de Mediación Arbitraje y Gestión del Conflicto en Derecho Privado
education.description: TFM - Artículo: "¿Es posible una cláusula de mediación en el contrato de servicio entre el usuario y el prestador privado de salud ?"

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Product Designer - Product owner - Customer experience
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: March 21, 2024, Natalia Belén worked with Mariana on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description:
He tenido el placer de trabajar con Mariana y puedo decir con total certeza que es una persona  responsable, empática y con una habilidad innata para trabajar en equipo. Siempre está dispuesta a potenciar las habilidades de sus compañeros y a fomentar un ambiente colaborativo donde todos puedan dar lo mejor de sí mismos.

Ha sido un verdadero placer colaborar con ella y espero sinceramente tener la oportunidad de trabajar juntas nuevamente en el futuro.

headline: Product Marketing | Project Management | BtoB - BtoC | Management | GTM strategies | Brand Manager  | Buyer | Sales
about:
Forte de 7 années d'expérience, j'ai développé des stratégies marketing à la fois offline et online, en gérant des budgets significatifs dans des environnements B2B et B2C. 
Ma passion pour le marketing et la vente va au-delà des campagnes publicitaires et promotionnelles ; elle réside avant tout dans la création de connexions significatives entre les marques et leurs consommateurs. À travers les années, j'ai appris à naviguer avec agilité dans l'évolution constante du paysage professionnel, restant constamment à l'affût des nouvelles tendances et technologies.

experience.description:
Development of Digital Strategy:
- Management of email marketing campaigns
- Management of LinkedIn paid campaigns
- SEO tactics to improve positioning

Brand Strengthening:
- Optimization of website structure
- Organization and execution of events and webinars to enhance brand presence

Design and Implementation of Sales Strategy:
- Automation of email processes
- Optimization of the sales process
- Lead management

Acquired and managed European supplier accounts:
- Conducted Outbound and Inbound prospecting - Email marketing 
- Analyzed prices and market trends - POWER BI
- Managed supplier relationships - CRM HUBSPOT

- Developed a sustainable Mezcal brand: responsible tourism events, ethical business model, and social media management
- Social and field work with a sustainable focus
- Managed a hostel: financial management, social networks, events

Purchased and managed categories for small appliances - TV & audio: 
- Developed digital marketing strategies: website structure, SEO, social media, and campaigns to increase online sales
- Planned and managed online ranges: product selection, purchase volumes, pricing and promotional mechanics
- Negotiated purchase prices
- Brand management: strengthened digital presence to increase traffic and improve conversion through blogs, events, etc.

experience.position: MARKETING PRODUCT MANAGER – FOOD PRIVATE LABELS
experience.description:
Managed the food promotional offer (annual turnover ~ 400M€ – 1500 stores - 150 international suppliers - Led a team of 3):
- Developed offline marketing strategies: in-store campaigns, brochures, seasonal catalogs, and events to increase traffic.
- Planned and managed online ranges: product selection, purchase volumes, pricing and promotional mechanics
- Brand management: organized press events and developed content to elevate brand perception and attract new customers
Product mix – development of the brand’s visibility in supermarkets
SEO – Community management – Web marketing

education.description: Mémoire Marketing sensoriel

headline: Fashion Consulting
about: Vivo mi pasión por la industria de la moda desde todos sus estadios productivos, con ánimos de aprender y crecer, personal y profesionalmente, aportando ideas frescas y de alto impacto que permitan avanzar en el cumplimiento de los objetivos organizacionales.

experience.location: Buenos Aires, Gran Buenos Aires, Argentina
experience.description: Gestionar equipo de seis personas y sus respectivas estaciones de trabajo, relación con proveedores y cumplimiento de metas de venta.

Responsable del PDV y atención al cliente.
Colocación de producto Visual Merchandising
Cumplimiento de metas comerciales
Búsqueda de nuevos canales de distribución y apertura de nuevas cuentas comerciales.

experience.position: Community Manager y Analista de Comunicaciones
experience.description:
Planificación y redacción de contenidos. Marketing de contenidos.
Gestión y optimización de relaciones con los clientes a través de las redes sociales.
Administración del las redes sociales.
Búsqueda de canales efectivos de comunicación para la colocación de campañas comerciales. 
Analista Internacional Certificado PDA.

Desarrollar, aplicar, coordinar y evaluar todas las tendencias de mercadeo para la capitalización de nuevos clientes y el posicionamiento de la marca.
Gestión de Branding y Relaciones Públicas.
Cumplir con el presupuesto establecido por el área.
Liderar equipo de seis miembros activos y destinar las diferentes funciones.
Selección, capacitación y desarrollo de los miembros de equipo.

Servicio al cliente.
Manejo de caja, cierres y arqueo, medios de pago.
Entrenamiento y desarrollo en la gestión del talento del equipo de trabajo.
Desarrollo de planes de trabajo para la optimización de recursos y materias primas, con resultados considerables logrando una disminución de consumo en los mismos.
Creación de nuevos portafolios de servicios a través de la segmentación de mercados.
Ejecución de eventos para incrementar la ventas.

education.description:
Estudiante especializado en la creación y producción de piezas de comunicación para el mundo de la moda.
Investigación y comprensión de las tendencias de consumo emergentes que lleven a diseñar propuestas comunicacionales innovadoras. Estoy capacitado para generar estrategias de difusión de marcas y empresas ligadas a este campo, así como también reflexionar y elaborar textos de opinión sobre el mundo de la moda.
education.insights: Activities and societies: III Encuentro Latinoamericano de Tendencias 2014

education.description: Egresado del programa con logros en la incursión de investigaciones que llevaron al descubrimiento de nichos de mercado significativos en la región con los cuales iniciar alternativas de negocio.
education.insights: Activities and societies: Semillero de Investigación en Psicología del Consumidor.

volunteering.description:
A AIESEC le debo la mitad de mis conocimientos y la experiencia profesional que tengo hoy. Es una plataforma que me volcó a un excelente grupo de universitarios con los que compartí actividades e intereses en común y juntos hacemos una red sólida y joven que propone desarollar líderes que impacten positivamente con sus ideas la aldea global.
Tener la oportunidad de cambiar el paragima de pensamiento local por global fue mi mayor adquisición.

experience.location: Buenos Aires, Gran Buenos Aires, Argentina
experience.description: Gestionar equipo de seis personas y sus respectivas estaciones de trabajo, relación con proveedores y cumplimiento de metas de venta.

Responsable del PDV y atención al cliente.
Colocación de producto Visual Merchandising
Cumplimiento de metas comerciales
Búsqueda de nuevos canales de distribución y apertura de nuevas cuentas comerciales.

experience.position: Community Manager y Analista de Comunicaciones
experience.description:
Planificación y redacción de contenidos. Marketing de contenidos.
Gestión y optimización de relaciones con los clientes a través de las redes sociales.
Administración del las redes sociales.
Búsqueda de canales efectivos de comunicación para la colocación de campañas comerciales. 
Analista Internacional Certificado PDA.

Desarrollar, aplicar, coordinar y evaluar todas las tendencias de mercadeo para la capitalización de nuevos clientes y el posicionamiento de la marca.
Gestión de Branding y Relaciones Públicas.
Cumplir con el presupuesto establecido por el área.
Liderar equipo de seis miembros activos y destinar las diferentes funciones.
Selección, capacitación y desarrollo de los miembros de equipo.

Servicio al cliente.
Manejo de caja, cierres y arqueo, medios de pago.
Entrenamiento y desarrollo en la gestión del talento del equipo de trabajo.
Desarrollo de planes de trabajo para la optimización de recursos y materias primas, con resultados considerables logrando una disminución de consumo en los mismos.
Creación de nuevos portafolios de servicios a través de la segmentación de mercados.
Ejecución de eventos para incrementar la ventas.

education.description:
Estudiante especializado en la creación y producción de piezas de comunicación para el mundo de la moda.
Investigación y comprensión de las tendencias de consumo emergentes que lleven a diseñar propuestas comunicacionales innovadoras. Estoy capacitado para generar estrategias de difusión de marcas y empresas ligadas a este campo, así como también reflexionar y elaborar textos de opinión sobre el mundo de la moda.
education.insights: Activities and societies: III Encuentro Latinoamericano de Tendencias 2014

education.description: Egresado del programa con logros en la incursión de investigaciones que llevaron al descubrimiento de nichos de mercado significativos en la región con los cuales iniciar alternativas de negocio.
education.insights: Activities and societies: Semillero de Investigación en Psicología del Consumidor.

volunteering.description:
A AIESEC le debo la mitad de mis conocimientos y la experiencia profesional que tengo hoy. Es una plataforma que me volcó a un excelente grupo de universitarios con los que compartí actividades e intereses en común y juntos hacemos una red sólida y joven que propone desarollar líderes que impacten positivamente con sus ideas la aldea global.
Tener la oportunidad de cambiar el paragima de pensamiento local por global fue mi mayor adquisición.

headline: Supply Chain Manager | Industrial Engineer
about:
Ingeniero Industrial bilingüe con más de 7 años de experiencia internacional en Supply Chain, mejora de procesos y estrategias innovadoras para el crecimiento empresarial.

Encuentro motivación en la implementación de soluciones eficientes, gestión de la participación de las partes interesadas y fomento del crecimiento empresarial mediante la gestión de KPIs y la implementación de dashboards.

experience.description:
- Conduct regular carrier reviews in accordance with the established review schedule to ensure performance standards are met.
- Create and manage RFQ documents for tenders, ensuring effective communication with carriers throughout the process.
- Identify and develop new carriers to ensure capacity, cost competitiveness, and service delivery align with the company's carrier strategy.
- Onboard new carriers to LLP processes, ensuring seamless integration of third-party providers and external vendors.
- Oversee carrier compliance through the LLP approval process, ensuring 100% adherence to both LLP and customer compliance requirements.

- Developed and implemented a PowerBI dashboard to automate and standardize monthly and annual volume forecasts and reporting, optimizing 500 routes.
- KPI set-up to compare actual vs contractual performance of Logistics Suppliers.
- Project leader in establishing the Network to supply Balkans market.
- Determined capacity for each European hub through PowerBI.
- Built an annual CO2 emissions comparative for the main business routes using SQL and PowerBI, easing the logistics strategy decision-making process.

experience.location: Zárate, Buenos Aires, Argentina & Tokyo, Japan
experience.description:
- Acted as a liaison between Toyota Headquarters and Toyota Chile to ensure market supply, managing production orders and sales planning.
- Adjusted monthly sales plans in accordance with factory restrictions to align with production capacity and market demand.
- Successfully led and secured a $15M USD tender.
- Negotiated pricing with the Distributor to introduce new models and improve existing models positioning based on market and competitors research.
- Participated in a 2-month internal training program in Tokyo focused on Toyota internal systems usage.

- Responsible for the used vehicles registration program.
- Generated KPIs and metrics on used vehicles using Excel formulas to support strategic decisions.
- Suggested new locations to implement Points of Sales based on sales volume forecast and competitors research at a national level.

education.insights: Grade: Thesis on the Argentine automobile market using Machine Learning

headline: Backend Engineer  👩🏻‍💻  | Tech Lead  😉 | Python  🐍 |  Genexus  |  AWS Cloud Architect  ☁️ | Always looking for new opportunities 🚀
about: Profesional IT con más de 10 años de experiencia como desarrollador e implementador de soluciones de software.  Cuento con amplios conocimientos en múltiples tecnologías y herramientas de desarrollo que incluyen Genexus, AWS, y Python.  Además, me destaco en el diseño de arquitecturas Back-End y soluciones escalables integrando distintas tecnologías y plataformas como Cloud Computing, Internet Of Things y Data Science.

experience.description: Mis tareas principales son diseñar e implementar microservicios con el objetivo de generar funcionalidades eficientes y escalables que soporten las necesidades de nuestro producto.

Lideré equipo de investigación y desarrollo con el objetivo de adoptar nuevas tecnologías. Durante este período he podido diseñar y desarrollar PoCs y MVPs incursionando en tecnologías como Machine Learning, Internet of Things, RPA , Serverless y Cloud Computing.

Tech stack: Python, Flask, scikit-learn, Docker, RPA, Genexus , Amazon CloudFormation, AWS CDK, Serverless Framework
Lideré equipo de desarrollo, mantenimiento e implementación de producto propio dedicado a la gestión de requerimientos de desarrollo y ejecución de circuitos de CD-CD.
Logré integrar el core bancario Bantotal con diferentes sistemas satélites teniendo que interactuar con tecnologías como .Net, API Rest, Java, Genexus y SQL Server.

Gestioné diferentes proyectos de mantenimiento y construcción de software a medida, logrando asegurar entregas en tiempo y forma mediante la utilización de metodologías de desarrollo tanto Agile como Waterfall.
Además, participé en procesos de pre-venta, aprovechando mis conocimientos técnicos para lograr nuevos negocios.
Análisis Funcional, desarrollo,  e implementación  de requerimientos y modificaciones a core bancario Bantotal logrando reducir los tiempos de respuesta al cliente en un 30%.

Durante este período participe en dos grandes proyectos. 
En primer lugar  logré desarrollar e implementar en casa  de un cliente gubernamental una solución de gestión y digitalización de expedientes, participando en todas las etapas del proyecto desde el diseño hasta su implementación y capacitación a usuarios finales.
En segundo lugar, ayude en el desarrollo de nuevos módulos y actualización de un sistema legacy dedicado a administrar y gestionar pedidos y transportes de productos lácteos.
Participé en el diseño y desarrollo de un cotizador de seguros online para una importante Aseguradora de automotores utilizando tecnología Genexus, Java y SQL Server

headline: People Manager
about:
Diseñadora Gráfica con excelentes dotes de comunicación y una dilatada experiencia en ventas, gestión de empresas, Gestión de equipos, eventos, E-commerce y Marketing Online. 

Orientada a puestos de ventas y/o gestión multidisciplinar bajo las directrices marcadas por la dirección. 

Siempre en constante aprendizaje.

Soy una apasionada de internet y las nuevas tecnologías, me encanta sacarle partido a las posibilidades que estas ofrecen.

Amo las manualidades, y restaurar muebles, me encanta crear, decorar y darle una segunda vida a los objetos con mis manos, soy Palet adicta y fabrico muebles por hobby.

Otra pasión es la fotografía, me encanta capturar momentos.

profileTopEducation.schoolName: ENEB - Escuela de Negocios Europea de Barcelona

experience.description:
At SQ1, I lead the Human Resources area with a strong focus on people and collaboration. I work closely with teams across the company, listening actively and ensuring everyone feels supported, seen, and empowered in their roles.

My day-to-day involves a mix of operational and strategic tasks—from recruitment and onboarding to payroll, performance reviews, and internal communication—always balancing individual well-being with company goals. I care deeply about doing things right, maintaining transparency, and fostering a respectful and motivated work environment.

I don’t see myself as a traditional "boss"; I prefer to lead through empathy, clarity, and professionalism. My aim is to build a culture of trust, connection, and shared growth, where people can thrive and do their best work.

Square1 es una empresa Creativa de desarrollo de software Online tanto web como móvil. 
Tiene un equipo multidisciplinar altamente cualificado de programadores web, móviles iOS/Android y diseñadores de UI/UX, todos ellos dirigidos por experimentados Projects Managers.

Mi función en Square1 España como Operations Manager es muy versátil:

*Gestión integral de la oficina.
*Apertura nuevos mercados.
*Captación de nuevos perfiles/talentos.
*Comercialización, presentación, Networking.

element.headline: People Manager
element.about:
Diseñadora Gráfica con excelentes dotes de comunicación y una dilatada experiencia en ventas, gestión de empresas, Gestión de equipos, eventos, E-commerce y Marketing Online. 

Orientada a puestos de ventas y/o gestión multidisciplinar bajo las directrices marcadas por la dirección. 

Siempre en constante aprendizaje.

Soy una apasionada de internet y las nuevas tecnologías, me encanta sacarle partido a las posibilidades que estas ofrecen.

Amo las manualidades, y restaurar muebles, me encanta crear, decorar y darle una segunda vida a los objetos con mis manos, soy Palet adicta y fabrico muebles por hobby.

Otra pasión es la fotografía, me encanta capturar momentos.

experience.description:
At SQ1, I lead the Human Resources area with a strong focus on people and collaboration. I work closely with teams across the company, listening actively and ensuring everyone feels supported, seen, and empowered in their roles.

My day-to-day involves a mix of operational and strategic tasks—from recruitment and onboarding to payroll, performance reviews, and internal communication—always balancing individual well-being with company goals. I care deeply about doing things right, maintaining transparency, and fostering a respectful and motivated work environment.

I don’t see myself as a traditional "boss"; I prefer to lead through empathy, clarity, and professionalism. My aim is to build a culture of trust, connection, and shared growth, where people can thrive and do their best work.

Square1 es una empresa Creativa de desarrollo de software Online tanto web como móvil. 
Tiene un equipo multidisciplinar altamente cualificado de programadores web, móviles iOS/Android y diseñadores de UI/UX, todos ellos dirigidos por experimentados Projects Managers.

*Gestión integral de la oficina.
*Apertura nuevos mercados.

headline: Administrative & Digital Marketing Professional | Virtual Assistance | Social Media Content Creation | Customer Support | Growth-Oriented
about:
Como Social Media Content Creator, gestioné estrategias digitales durante más de un año para una clínica veterinaria en Reino Unido, enfocándome en redes sociales y automatización de procesos. Diseñé y ejecuté un plan de contenidos en Instagram que mejoró el engagement y dirigió el tráfico hacia WhatsApp, además de implementar chatbots para optimizar tiempos de respuesta.  

Mi experiencia combina marketing digital, creación de contenido y herramientas como HubSpot, Slack y Trello. Me motiva fortalecer la presencia digital de las marcas a través de soluciones prácticas y creativas, contribuyendo al crecimiento y la eficiencia de los equipos en entornos dinámicos.

experience.description:
Increased Instagram engagement by developing a strategic content calendar and tailored visual assets.

Implemented an automated WhatsApp chatbot system, reducing response times and improving client conversion rates.

Strengthened the brand’s digital presence by combining educational content with interactive campaigns, growing the online community.

Optimized accounting record processes and documentation control, reducing errors in financial reporting.

Centralized and digitalized administrative information, improving traceability across multiple companies within the group.

Ensured timely issuance of invoices and accounting entries, securing compliance and steady cash flow.

Achieved and exceeded lead acquisition goals by applying persuasive techniques and personalized follow-ups.

Boosted annual membership renewal rates through email marketing campaigns and referral programs.

Enhanced customer experience by handling inquiries and providing tailored solutions, increasing client retention.

Managed supplier payments and bank reconciliations with high accuracy, strengthening vendor relationships.

Improved the scheduling of tax and supplier payments, optimizing company cash flow.

Produced actionable financial reports, supporting strategic decision-making.

Strengthened financial organization through efficient control of invoicing, reconciliations, and account statements.

Enhanced supplier coordination and logistics management, reducing delays and claims.

Designed a filing and documentation tracking system that streamlined internal processes.

Successfully managed wholesale client relationships and production control, ensuring timely deliveries.

Boosted online sales by optimizing the use of e-commerce platforms (Tienda Nube) and social media channels.

Coordinated logistics and commercial scheduling, improving distribution efficiency.
skills: Administración de la cadena de suministro

experience.description:
▪ Facturación, emisión y control de notas de crédito y débito.
▪ Planificación de logística diaria.
▪ Atención al público en showroom.
▪ Atención e-commerce  (Mercado libre/RRSS)
▪ Tareas operarias: Control de stock, inventario, picking y armado de pedidos.
▪  Compras - pago a proveedores.

▪Ventas mayoristas en comercio, telefónicas y on-line (redes sociales).
▪ Manejo de caja y moneda extranjera.
▪ Sistema Gestión uno.
▪ Control de cuenta corriente y facturación.
▪ Envíos de paquetes al interior y control de remitos.
▪ Tareas operarias: Control de stock, inventario, picking y armado de pedidos.

headline: Diseño industrial - Diseño gráfico - Docente
about: Diseñador industrial con perfil gráfico, con experiencia en diseño de producto, PLV, espacios, identidad visual y docencia. Mi formación integral y trayectoria multidisciplinaria me permiten adaptarme con flexibilidad y aportar soluciones creativas y funcionales en diversos proyectos. Me considero una persona comprometida, curiosa y con fuerte orientación al trabajo en equipo.
topSkills: Adobe InDesign • Adobe Photoshop • Adobe Illustrator • SolidWorks • Rhinoceros

experience.description:
Identidad de marca: desarrollo de concepto, naming e identidad visual para consultora de recursos humanos. Diseño y maquetación de manual de marca.
Diseño editorial: maquetación y diseño de tapa de libro.

Diseñador industrial y gráfico en estudio multidisciplinario. Diseño y desarrollo de PLV, mobiliario y exhibidores para el sector retail. Rediseño de espacios gastronómicos y proyectos gráficos para comunicación corporativa.

Responsabilidades principales:
Gestión integral de proyectos: diseño, presupuestos, proveedores y seguimiento de producción.
Diseño de PLV: diseño e interpretación de troqueles y diseño de gráfica aplicada.
Diseño de piezas gráficas: afiches, folletería, dossiers y material promocional.
Diseño de mobiliario: modelado 3D, renders, planos técnicos y archivos de producción.
Diseño web: para Ruta99 (Generalitat Valenciana).

Clientes destacados

headline: AI | Optimization Lover ❤️
about: I am a highly motivated professional with a strong passion for data and its transformative potential. With several years of experience in the field, I have been involved in diverse projects focused on machine learning, big data, and analytics. Expertise in computer vision, NLP tasks and combination of both; semantic search, reranking, object detection, and visual classification. Skilled in models optimization, developing data pipelines, and implementing data-driven solutions. Ready to drive AI innovation.

currentPosition.companyName: EUIPO - European Union  Intellectual Property Office

experience.companyName: EUIPO - European Union  Intellectual Property Office
experience.description:
Working on a content-based image retrieval system combine with metadata (NLP) for Intellectual Property. Employing SOTA computer vision models and multimodal models in combination of image processing techniques to perform searches in million of images. Continuous development of PoCs and researching for metrics improvement.
Extending content-based image retrieval system to 3D models. Similar use case but working with 3D shapes.
Airflow dynamic DAGs development for pipelines processing.
Training object detection models for tracking forbidden symbols in images.
Training visual classifiers models and implementing visual explanations for final users.

Optimizations tasks:
➜ Models: speed enhancements for predictions and feature extraction.
➜ Accuracy: Re-ranking functions for integration of diverse sources.
➜ API and Architecture : tweak models serving configurations and deployment for higher RPS.
➜ Vector space: quantization, faster search times, less storage, recall tradeoff and metadata filtering.
➜ Monitoring: speed performance and drifting.

Writing guidelines for the team about experimentation and hyperparameteres optimization using optimization frameworks and tracking tools. And model distribution and inference optimization through custom APIs.

➜ AB Testing framework: development of bayesian approach and enhancement of frequentist approach. (featuring big data processing, statistical calculations and results exploration/delivery)
➜ Big data lambda architecture on Amazon Kinesis. Modifications made for better throughput and monitoring.
➜ Hive and Presto: monitoring, optimization and develop of custom functionalities for data lake running on Amazon EMR.
➜ Development of Spark applications for large-scale data processing.

➜ Machine learning: building of 3 models (Python stack, featuring deployment and monitoring) :
-Convolutional Neural Network model for detecting brands logos on realtime TV broadcast.
-Gradient boosting model for overtime hours approval.
-Random forest model for work absence forecasting.
➜ Data Engineering: creation and monitoring data pipelines made with Apache Airflow.
➜ Data Visualization (BI): transform company into a data driven company, implementing Tableau and Metabase. Creation of initial dashboards with differents KPIs.
➜ Analytics streaming: big data solution development for analytics module of VOD and live streaming platform.
➜ IT Vendors evaluation.
➜ Infrastructure: design and deployment of scalability solutions for high availability on AWS.
Support and assistance in the last subject of computer systems engineering career.

Analysis, design, development and deployment of various software systems.
Used Technologies: .NET Framework 4, C#, ASP .NET MVC 4, NHibernate 3.3, StructureMap, JQuery, Knockout, SQL Server & MySQL, WCF, Domain Driven Design, Bootstrap, SignalR
Used Technologies: .NET Framework 4, C#, ASP .NET MVC 3, Entity Framework 4, Autofac, JQuery, Knockout, SQL Server 2012
Used Technologies: .NET Framework 3.5, C#, ASP .NET Webforms, Infragistics, SQL Server 2008, JQuery, WCF
Used Technologies: .NET Framework 3.5, C#, ASP .NET MVC 2, NHibernate, Automapper, StructureMap, MySQL 5, WCF, Castle, Coolite
Used Technologies: .NET Framework 3.5, C#, Winforms, MVP Pattern, NHibernate, SQL Server 2005, Castle, DevExpress

experience.companyName: Government of the Province of Buenos Aires
experience.description: Used Technologies: Struts, Hibernate, Apache Axis2, JUnit, Apache Lucene, Oracle
Used Technologies: MS Access, SQL Server, MySQL, Linux Gentoo, Linux Debian, Apache, PHP 5, Java EE, Samba, Struts, db4o, Hibernate, ICEfaces, XML-RPC, C, Visual Basic 6

experience.companyName: Ministerio de Educación de la Nación
experience.description: Used Technologies: PHP, MySQL, Visual Basic 6

experience.companyName: Secretaria de Educación del Gobierno de la Ciudad de Bs. As.
experience.description: Used Technologies: .NET Framework 1.1, Visual Basic .NET, MySQL

education.degree: Master's Degree in Data Exploitation and Knowledge Discovery
education.description:
First year content: Probability & Statistics, Exploratory & Confirmatory data analysis, Feature engineering, Linear regression, Logistic regression, Decision Trees, Naive Bayes, Neural Networks, Ensemble methods (bagging, boosting & stacking), Evaluation Metrics,  Dimensionality reduction, Clustering, Distance metrics types, Self-organizing map, Association rules, Bayesian inference, Genetic algorithm, Graph theory, etc.
Among all models  built and activities done in the different subjects, i would highlight a real churn model for a bank and a brain sections's power graph analysis.
Content: Techniques and Tools for Big Data, Data Mining and Machine Learning for Business Analytics, Data Warehousing and OLAP & Information Visualization.

headline: Industrial Organization Engineer | Consultant | Data & Process Analyst
about:
Data & process optimization professional with experience in documenting workflows, improving operations, and supporting decision-making through data analysis.
I have worked with companies in logistics, energy, and consulting, managing structural data in SAP, auditing projects, and streamlining processes.

Since 2022, based in Valencia, Spain, I have also collaborated remotely on freelance projects — from database updates to digital content creation and basic analytics — while continuing to expand my skills in SQL, Python, and data visualization. Passionate about turning information into actionable insights and delivering measurable improvements.
topSkills: Trabajo en equipo • Capacidad de análisis • Gestión de proyectos • Mejora de procesos • Microsoft Excel

experience.position: Freelance Projects – Data Management & Digital Content
experience.description: Supporting entrepreneurs and small businesses with: Data management and database updates; Creation and scheduling of digital content for social media and YouTube; Graphic design and illustrations for online publications; Basic metrics analysis and performance optimization.

experience.location: Valencia/València, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España
experience.description: Assisted in diagnosing, repairing, and maintaining smartphones. Provided basic customer service and managed devices at the repair shop.

Conducted detailed organizational structure analyses in collaboration with business leaders and managers to align structures with strategic objectives.
Edited and maintained job descriptions to ensure clarity, consistency, and alignment with organizational standards.
Performed job evaluations using Mercer Win, providing data-driven insights to support compensation and organizational decisions.
Managed organizational changes and ensured data quality assurance (QA) in SAP, maintaining accuracy and compliance with company standards.
Oversaw IT project progress, facilitating communication between stakeholders and ensuring timely delivery of key milestones.

Conducted surveys and comprehensive documentation of existing processes to identify inefficiencies and areas for improvement.
Identified and proposed opportunities for process optimization to enhance operational efficiency.
Developed and documented new procedures, ensuring alignment with company policies and industry standards.
Monitored the implementation and progress of new projects, providing insights to support successful execution.
Performed internal audits of processes across departments, ensuring compliance with established protocols and identifying corrective actions.

Project at Tenaris – SAP Commercial and Logistics for the Americas (01/2013–12/2013):
Defined and implemented a comprehensive communication strategy to support project rollout across multiple regions. Conducted roles and user mapping to align system access with organizational responsibilities and ensure seamless transitions.
Performed impact analyses to assess the effects of system changes on business operations and processes. Developed and delivered training materials tailored to a specific audience, ensuring effective knowledge transfer and user adoption.

Project at Tenaris - SAP Commercial and Logistics for the Americas Project (01/2013-12/2013): Defined and implemented a comprehensive communication strategy to support project rollout across multiple regions. Conducted roles and user mapping to align system access with organizational responsibilities and ensure seamless transitions.

Project at a Bank – “Normative Service” (10/2012–01/2013):
Conducted surveys, defined and documented active procedures, and identified improvement opportunities to enhance operational efficiency. 

Activities at the Consulting Agency:
Provided implementation support for the “BPM Oracle” project at Tarjeta Naranja, including assistance in preparing a foundational methodology. Identified process improvement opportunities in Microsoft Office training courses (Word, Access, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio). Supported business proposals by conducting market research in TM Forum, focusing on the Telecommunications, IT, Media, and Other Services industries.

Project at a Bank – “Customer Retention” (11/2010–07/2011):
Prepared detailed reports to analyze and support customer retention efforts. Defined and recommended IT tools required to enhance operational efficiency. Collected and monitored operational statistics to identify trends and areas for corrective actions. Supported training initiatives, ensuring team readiness and alignment with retention strategies. Oversaw the implementation and continuous monitoring of processes to ensure their effectiveness.

Project at a Bank – “Process Documentation” (08/2011–03/2012):
Conducted current situation assessments, including impact analysis of audit observations, high-level understanding of executed tasks, and clarification of roles and responsibilities across departments.
Designed high-level processes and developed flowcharts to document workflows. Facilitated validation and adjustment of process designs, identifying opportunities for improvement. Held meetings with external suppliers to ensure alignment with project goals and deliverables.

Project at DIRECTV – “Demand Management Implementation” (03/2012–09/2012):
Assessed the current situation, identifying process gaps and improvement areas. Supported the redefinition and optimization of demand management processes. Created and delivered training materials to support user adoption. Provided market support for the implementation of quick wins and the broader process across multiple regions (Argentina, Regional, Caribbean, Ecuador, Uruguay, and Peru).

element.headline: Industrial Organization Engineer | Consultant | Data & Process Analyst
element.about:
Data & process optimization professional with experience in documenting workflows, improving operations, and supporting decision-making through data analysis.
I have worked with companies in logistics, energy, and consulting, managing structural data in SAP, auditing projects, and streamlining processes.

Since 2022, based in Valencia, Spain, I have also collaborated remotely on freelance projects — from database updates to digital content creation and basic analytics — while continuing to expand my skills in SQL, Python, and data visualization. Passionate about turning information into actionable insights and delivering measurable improvements.
